story.storybody: (Attn.editors: The following press release comes to you under an arrangement with PRNewswire. PTI takes no editorial responsibility for the same). BANGALORE, June 1, 2016/PRNewswire/ -- More Than Half a Million Le Superphone Users get the Much-awaited Supertainment Membership The brand new update for eUI 5.5 has finally arrived. The new OTA version eUI 5.5.014S will now enable users to seamlessly view their favorite channels and movies on the go. Apart from bringing Made for India Supertainment alive, the new OTA update will also enhance the battery life of Superphones besides ironing out minor glitches faced by some users. In other words, it will make the Superphone usage handier and more seamless. The Levidi app that is powered by Eros Now will allow LeEco members to access over 2000+movies across different Indian languages. Users will also be able to browse and watch 100+ live TV channels through the LIVE app on their Superphone that is powered by Yupp TV. LeEco Drive and LeMusic services will be available in Q3 2016. Users of Superphones are now empowered to access content of their choice - whenever, wherever. Even better, it allows for uninterrupted viewing minus the tedium of frequent Ad breaks, which often mar the enjoyment of watching a movie or exciting TV show. Apart from Supertainment content, Le Superphones have powerful processors for multitasking and USB Type C chargers for super fast charging. While Le 1s Eco is powered by MediaTek Helio X10 processor, Le 1s is powered by MediaTek Helio X10 Processor, and Le Max is powered by Qualcomm Snapdragon 810 processor. The Superphones also have the Le Touch feature that gives its fingerprint sensor a precision rate of 99.3 percent. more PRNewswire GSV
